Online store

An online store CRUD application Built with Angular Node.js and MySql

About this project

This poject was made with Angular for building the user interfaces.I improved my understanding of Front-End programming And also integrated my application to a Node server and MySql database to manage the information.

go live see code

Details

Front End FrameWork

Angular is written in TypeScript.And by so Programming in angular is a diffrent experience after a project with react. Using objects instead of function , in the end i got used to it and i like both very much!

Node js

I used node js with Express.js Building a RestFull Api for managing requests from the client side.I used json web tokens for authentication.

MySql Database

I used MySql a relational database. I had to learn SQL to Query the database and get the data i need. Also i needed to Creat the database and understand the relations between the informations
